com.newmainsoftech.spray.slingong.datastore
Class AnnotationTransactionOnStaticMethodAspect

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.transaction.interceptor.TransactionAspectSupport
      com.newmainsoftech.spray.slingong.datastore.AnnotationTransactionOnStaticMethodAspect
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class AnnotationTransactionOnStaticMethodAspect
extends org.springframework.transaction.interceptor.TransactionAspectSupport

Supplemental aspect to Spring's AnnotationTransactionAspect for static method annotated with @Transactionalannotation, since AnnotationTransactionAspect aspect does not cover static method annotated with @Transactional annotation.

Author:
Arata Y.

Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.springframework.transaction.interceptor.TransactionAspectSupport

AnnotationTransactionOnStaticMethodAspect

public AnnotationTransactionOnStaticMethodAspect()
Method Detail

pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalType

protected static void pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalType()
AspectJ's Pointcut for execution of public method annotated with @Transactional annotation.
This is copy from Spring's AnnotationTransactionAspect aspect.

pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicTransactionalMethodInTransactionalType

protected static void pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicTransactionalMethodInTransactionalType()
AspectJ's Pointcut for execution of public transactional method in class annotated with @Transactional annotation.
This is copy from Spring's AnnotationTransactionAspect aspect.

pointcutAtExecutionOfTransactionalMethod

protected static void pointcutAtExecutionOfTransactionalMethod()
AspectJ's Pointcut for execution of method annotated with @Transactional annotation.
This excludes join-point picked up by pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalType().
This is copy from Spring's AnnotationTransactionAspect aspect.

pointcutAtExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod

protected static void pointcutAtExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod()
AspectJ's Pointcut for execution of either static method annotated with @Transactional annotation or public static method in class annotated with @Transactional annotation.

beforeAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod

public void beforeAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
AspectJ's Before advise to create new transaction before execution of either static method annotated with @Transactional annotation or public static method in class annotated with @Transactional annotation.
The body of advise is copy from before-advise of Spring's AbstractTransactionAspect aspect.

Parameters:
joinPoint -

afterThrowingAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod

public void afterThrowingAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint,
                                                                     Throwable throwable)
AspectJ's AfterThrowing advise to complete transaction after exception during execution of either static method annotated with @Transactional annotation or public static method in class annotated with @Transactional annotation.
The body of advise is copy from after-throwing-advise of Spring's AbstractTransactionAspect aspect.

Parameters:
joinPoint -
throwable -

afterReturningAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod

public void afterReturningAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint,
                                                                      Object txObject)
AspectJ's AfterReturning advise to commit transaction after normal completion of execution of either static method annotated with @Transactional annotation or public static method in class annotated with @Transactional annotation.
The body of advise is copy from after-returning-advise of Spring's AbstractTransactionAspect aspect.

Parameters:
joinPoint -
txObject -

afterAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod

public void afterAdvisedExecutionOfStaticTransactionalMethod(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
AspectJ's After advise to clean up transaction after execution of either static method annotated with @Transactional annotation or public static method in class annotated with @Transactional annotation.
The body of advise is copy from after-advise of Spring's AbstractTransactionAspect aspect.

Parameters:
joinPoint -
